message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500.  I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,250. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
